Texts.Eng: Now we can get a bit more adventurous. Create a ^orange;Large Apiary^reset; to double your bee farm potential. You'll need some ^orange;Golden Wood^reset; to build it. Try ^cyan;Bumblebees or Orchid bees^reset;.
These sweet babies can hold ^green;two frames^reset;, and twice as many drones means twice as much production, too. The gains are quite substantial!
